# Question 1: Generate Simulated Data:

```{r}
set.seed(1)
x <- runif(100, min=0, max=100) # generate a sequence of numbers from 1 - 100
e <- rnorm(100, mean = 0, sd = 0.2) # ei ~ N(0, 0.2)
y <- sin(x / 10) + e # generate y as a noisy sine wave
```
